name: Billy Skyscraper
description:
Story :

You play as Billy, a jetpack avenger trying to infiltrate bank skyscrapers to retrieve money stolen by a secret organisation. A Die and Retry I made last year. My first game in fact. The kind of game : "Simple controls, hard to master". If you enjoy that game style too, you may love it.


Goals :

>> Retrieve the money stolen by an organisation of evil bankers.

>> In addition to the nombre of coins collected, the game keeps track of your performance in the art of jetpack heists, using a combo system called strikes as a throwback to bowling. Coins or pins, the goal is to get'em'all after all...

The system is quite simple, each cart has a total of 5 coins, if you manage to snatch them all, you score a "strike" activating the combo system. Each consecutive strike adds to the multiplier to the values of the coin on the following cart.

>> Collect all the badges.


Controls :

Up : [arrow up] or [space]

Turbo kick : [arrow right] or [ctrl] ; Use it to break windows and kick enemies.
